item.title: Monteverde
item.description: Introduction IP: 10.10.10.172 This is my write-up for the Hack the Box machine Monteverde Initial nmap scan Running the inital nmap scan nmap -sV -sC -p- -oN nmap 10.10.10.172 Yielded the following results From here, you can see that there are 18 open ports and that the windows is running on windows Ports that stand out Port 389 - shows that there's an Active Directory domain named MEGABANK present on the system which may become useful later

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! I'm Matt, an aspiring ethical hacker. I love cyber security and engaging with CTFs and Bounty Hunting I am currently studying Computer Science at the University of Lincoln in the UK The purpose of this blog is to demonstrate my understanding, and methodology of Hacking, more specifically tailored towards web and software hacking. There are a few websites that I primarily use: 1.) HackTheBox - A website dedicated to CTFs and the practice of penetration testing

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my blog! This is where I'll be posting my CTF write-ups, hobby material & other things. Feel free to contact me on twitter @xyniath
